Plot: Three different stories involving digital creatures collide together.
Title: Digimon: The Movie
Writer: Akiyoshi Hongo (original concept), Jeff Nimoy (adaptation), Bob Buchholz (adaptation), Jeff Nimoy (screenplay), Bob Buchholz (screenplay), Reiko Yoshida (scenario: original production)
Actors: Lara Jill Miller, Joshua Seth, Bob Papenbrook, David Lodge
tomatoConsensus: Digimon is better than Pokemon, but it's still a predictable movie with mediocre animation.
